meanings.definition: A small, crescent-shaped mark or structure
meanings.sent1: The artist drew a beautiful lunule in the corner of the painting.
meanings.sent2: I found a shiny rock with a tiny lunule on its surface.
meanings.sent3: The lunule on the tree bark looked like a smiling face.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace had a delicate lunule pendant hanging from it.
meanings.sent5: The garden was decorated with colorful stones, each with a unique lunule design.

meanings.definition: A small, moon-shaped area on the base of a fingernail
meanings.sent1: She painted her lunule with a sparkly nail polish.
meanings.sent2: His manicure included a silver accent on each lunule.
meanings.sent3: The nail artist created a tiny garden scene on her lunule.
meanings.sent4: The lunule on her thumb resembled a miniature moon.
meanings.sent5: The lunule on his index finger had a tiny star sticker on it.
